TEI.2.document_title: Thomas J Pilgrim to Stephen F Austin, 12-11-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas J. Pilgrim to Austin, December 11, 1829. Bill for tuition.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 300

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas J. Pilgrim to Austin, December 11, 1829. Bill for tuition.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1829">1829 */date_mentioned* To *person_mentioned*T. J. Pilgrim*/person_mentioned* Dr.*/p*
*p*To one *person_mentioned*Scholar */person_mentioned*9 Months ending *date_mentioned n="12-13-1829">Dec 13th*/date_mentioned* at $2.50 per Month—— $22. 50*/p*
*p*To one *person_mentioned*Scholar */person_mentioned*3 Months ending*date_mentioned n="12-13-1829"> Dec 13th */date_mentioned*at $3.00 per Month_____$ 9. 00*/p*
*p*To one Dollar lent——— $ 1.00*/p*
*p*32.50*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Thomas J. Pilgrim*/person_mentioned* appears and makes Oath that the within Account is just and True *date_mentioned n="12-11-1829">Decr 11, 1829*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Thomas J. Pilgrim*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*J. White */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
